Microsoft Blend SDK / Expression binaries notice

Source: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=10801
Retrieved: 2026-02-21

The following binaries are distributed under Microsoft SDK/EULA terms:
- System.Windows.Interactivity.dll
- Microsoft.Expression.Interactions.dll
- Microsoft.Expression.Drawing.dll
- Microsoft.Expression.Effects.dll

Use and redistribution are governed by Microsoft terms for the corresponding SDK.
This notice is a tracking aid; verify and keep the applicable Microsoft terms
with final binary distribution.
